articles.title: What is mpox, what countries is it in and how do you catch it?
articles.description: Mpox, which used to be called monkeypox, is declared a global public health emergency.
articles.content:
Mpox disease is caused by the monkeypox virus. This is from the same group of viruses as smallpox but is much less harmful.
